thread.section_title: The Independent Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: great hotel in great location
thread.title_full: great hotel in great location - Review of The Independent Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: lil812
title: great hotel in great location
text:
the hotel located right next to termini station - where all the metro lines and buses leave. the staff is very pleasant, kind and helpful. we were celebrating a birthday and we got upgraded to junior suite which was very nice.
the staff at the dinning room was very kind, especially Juan Carlos, Luigi and Fabio :)
we sure recommend the Independent Hotel!
